product.allergens: sool, taimsed rasvad (palmi, shea, soorea), lõhna- ja maitsetugevdajad (naatriumglutamaat, dinaatriumguanülaat,dinaatriuminosinaat), tärklis, suhkur, sibul (4,4%), porgand (1,5%),küüslauk (1,3%), petersell (1,3%), tomatipasta, SELLERISEEMNED, punane paprika, karamellisiirup, lõhna- ja maitseained (kaasa arvatud SELLER), maltodekstriin, porrulauk, kurkum, pipar, pärmiekstrakt, juurpetersell, köögivilju 7%.
product.etailerUrl: 1. Get a casserole or pot and bring it up to medium heat before pouring in the oil. Drop in the onions, garlic and ginger and sauté slowly for about 2 minutes or until you can smell the lovely aroma of the thoroughly cooked vegetables. 2. It’s time to drop in those chicken pieces and stir until it turns white in color.3. Pour in the water and throw in your Knorr Chicken Broth cubes. Bring this to a simmer until chicken is tender and cooked through.4. You can now add your sayote or green papaya and cook until tender.5. Dahon ng sili is added at the last stage to ensure leaves (and nutrients) don’t dry up. Give this a minute then it is done. Malunggay is also another healthy alternative because it is packed with vitamins and minerals which are good for nursing moms and kids as well.
product.feature5: Täiuslik vürtside segu annab roale erilise maitse ja täiusliku konsistentsi.
product.productDescription: With the perfect combination of Vegetables flavor, onion, parsley and spices, this bouillon brings out the best flavor in your favorite dishes. Great with soups, sauces, vegetables, pasta, chicken recipes and much more.
product.productShortDescription: Knorr juurviljapuljong. Valmista maitsev kuum roog minutitega. Täiuslik vürtside segu annab roale erilise maitse ja täiusliku konsistentsi.
product.ingredients: Säilitada kuivas, jahedas ja pimedas kohas.
